head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SIEGEL, DR. JACK G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SIEGEL, DR. JACK G.

block.p: SIEGEL-Dr. Jack G. of Roseland, NJ, on Wednesday, June 28, 2000. Husband of the late Beatrice B. (nee Busch) Siegel, father of Judith Croman and Audrey Small, father-in-law of Marc Small and Milton Westrich, grandfather of Steven and David Croman, Ali Small and the late Eric Small, great-grandfather of Jake Croman. Services Temple B'nai Jeshurun, 1025 South Orange Ave, Short Hills, NJ, Friday, 11AM. Interment Temple B'nai Jeshurun Cemetery, Hillside, N.J. A Period of mourning will be observed at the home of Judith Croman, South Orange, NJ through Tuesday. For information, Bernheim Apter Goldsticker, Maplewood, NJ.

SIEGEL-Dr. Jack G. of Roseland, NJ, on Wednesday, June 28, 2000. Husband of the late Beatrice B. (nee Busch) Siegel, father of Judith Croman and Audrey Small, father-in-law of Marc Small and Milton Westrich, grandfather of Steven and David Croman, Ali Small and the late Eric Small, great-grandfather of Jake Croman. Services Temple B'nai Jeshurun, 1025 South Orange Ave, Short Hills, NJ, Friday, 11AM. Interment Temple B'nai Jeshurun Cemetery, Hillside, N.J. A Period of mourning will be observed at the home of Judith Croman, South Orange, NJ through Tuesday. For information, Bernheim Apter Goldsticker, Maplewood, NJ.
